alert.note: Alert for Dickey; La Moure; Logan; McIntosh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 22 at 2:52AM CST until February 22 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions in open country. Additional snow accumulations around 1 inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Dickey, LaMoure, Logan, and McIntosh Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Significant drifting may make some roads impassable.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. Notify a friend or family member of your travel plans. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
